Name: Heartbeat Event Message Registry
Description: This registry defines the messages to use for periodic heartbeat, also known as 'keep alive', events.

RedfishServiceFunctional.Description: An event sent periodically upon request to indicates that the Redfish service is functional.
RedfishServiceFunctional.LongDescription: This message shall be used to indicate that the Redfish service is functional.  This message shall only be sent if specifically requested by an event destination during the creation of a subscription using the `SendHeartbeatMinutes` property.
